ComicInfo.Summary:
Shell Game: Melody comes up with a plan to get Max Solomon off of Laura's back.
Rat And Ruin: A Vampire mouse chooses a victim who isn't quite what he expects.
Terry Times Three: Terri and Terre advertise for a roommate, but don't specify a sex. So when a handsome male answers the ad, the girls are torn between propriety and lust.
